issues.title: What is the status of this repository?
issues.body:
Hi,
This is an amazing library. I haven't implemented it yet but I think it does the most of work needed for the our project. Can you tell me if this library is stable? I would also like contribute to it. 
- Suraj

commits.message: Switched to PSR code formatting. Use spaces for indentation.
Removed unused imports.

Merge pull request #3 from robertvheb/master

Fixed timer subscription signal name bug.
Raises min PHP version to 5.6.
Removed PHP 5.5 and HHVM travis builds.
Adjusted dependency version constraints.
Restricted expression package dependency to 0.1 version.
Fixed exclusion of PGSQL on HHVM.
Changed travis build, using cache and PHP 7 must not fail anymore.
Adapted to new streams API.
Update composer.json
Added settings for faster update.
Added git attributes.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/koolkode/bpmn.git
Changed stability settings.
Fixed error in example code.
Simplified deletion of execution variables.
Simplified sync queries in the process engine.
Fixed warning due to uninitialized var.
Removed hhvm-nighlty build from travis build file.
Removed directory sample as it is contained in the example config.
Added a sample config using Sqlite.
Added installation instruction and engine setup sample code.
Switched to using DISTINCT as MAX() is not applicable to bytea in PSQL.
Attempting pessimistic locking within DB.
Added async methods to RuntimeService.
Updated readme file.
Added PHP 7 dev build to test PHP versions.
Added job ID and boundary event info to event subscriptions.
Bumped master branch alias to 0.2.x

BC BREAK: remobed SUB_FLAG constants from engine, use
EventSubscription::TYPE_* instead.
Added event subscription / query to the engine.
BC BREAK: Renamed generic "parentId" into "parentExecutionId".
Added BPMN link event support.
Sub process is not a scope root anymore.
Added proper signal support checking to behaviors.
Implemented receive task with message.
Implemented job locking and error handling using retries.
Excluded order by generation when performing a count query.
Added job creation time to DB and query.
Added consistent query paging via default order by per query.
Added limit, offset and ordering options to all queries.
Added process business key to tasks.
Bumped min DB version to 0.1.3
Adjusted to changed DB connection API.

Fixed timer subscription node delegation (needed by event based
gateway).
Fixed log message.

Job executor will allways store jobs but emit a warning when no
scheduler is set.
Added boundary event activity tracking.
Fixed triggering start activity twice.
Changed activity events in event based gateway... again :P
Added JSON serialization of job entity.
Starting activities behind event based gateway when gate is executed.
Added query filter for resource ID to deployment query.
Added NULL before job removal using subscription query.
Jobs will not be scheduled when no job executor is available.
Added additional indexes.
Added paranthesis around composite filter conditions.
Added businessKey to JSON genaretd by historic process instance.

Added optional 1 millisecond delay preventing wrong sequence of events
in history.
Hitoric process instance provides access to variable data now.
Bugfix: Fixed wrong column name in history service.
Simplified event based gateway test case.

RuntimeService now returns historized instances, allows for processes
without any wait state.
History does not keep track of individual executions anymore.
Working around PostgreSQL problem now and added FIXME as a reminder.
Attempting to fix PostgreSQL bug... seems strange.
Investigatins strange PostgreSQL test fail...
Notifications and message throwing utilizes delegate execution now.
Removed unnedded syncing of executions from scope activity.
Added access to process definition ID from delegate execution.
Added more historization data (pid / business_key / state / vars).
Added receive tasks without message and a test case.
Added tracking of start and end activities for executions.
(Hopefully) fixed HHVM error related to DateTime::createFromFormat().
Added script task test case.

Script tasks may no load script files from deployment of the process
definition.
added retrieval of single resources from a deployment instance.
Improved scope isolation of script task and added test case.
Removed simple test case as everything is testet more specific now.
Added delegate task test case and task event verification.
Added support for unspecific tasks and a test case.
Added expression task test case.
Fixed activity tracking in gateways.
Enabled storing user task completion in history.
Process definition is now refered to from audit trail.
Added audit events to parallel, exclusive and inclusive gateway.
Added audit trail to the engine... work in progress.
User task events now inherit from audit event.
Introduced audit events throughout the process engine.
Added events for activity tracking.
Added deserializetion of resource id within process definition.
Added a way to retrieve deployed resource contents from DB.
Fixed bug in process definition query...
Added "resourceId" to JSON-serialization of process definition.
Storing BPMN diagram resource ID with process definitions now.
Fixed retrieval of local / scoped variables using commands.
Refactored test of event based gateway.
BC Break: Renamend "activityId" to "definitionKey" in tasks.
Added test case for parallel gateway.
Added test case for exclusive gateways.
Bumped DB dependency to min version 0.1.2 due to PostgreSQL.
Added inclusive gateway join test.
Added some tests for inclusive gateways.
Removed unneeded method from boundary activity.
Moved passing signal vars into AbstractActivity.
Fixed serialization of variables in event received commands.
Excluded isSerializable() in commands from code coverage report.
Refactored timer subscription and improved basic subscription command.
extracted abstracted event subscription from signal / message.
Properly serializing variables when used in commands now.
Improved non-interrupting leaving and scope logging.
Switched to VoidCommand usage during async continuations.
Switched to true signal delegation for signal / message events.
Added boundary event tracking to event subscriptions.
Adapted signal delegation API.

Fixed scope handling, should still be optimized for lower number of
executions.
Simplified creation of sub process nodes.
Terminate end event terminates scope root... again ;)
Fixed signature of inherited AbstractActivity::processSignal().
Integrated changes related to process version 0.1.5
Terminate end cannot use scoe root anymore, switched to scope.

Refactored old behaviors into activities, needs more worl related to
scopes / execution hierarchy.
Refactored more activities and switched to leave() method calls.
Started improving behaviors by modeling them as "activities".
Added support for ISO date timers and expressions in timer definitions.
Implemented timer durations using DateInterval.
Ensuring UTC timezone for jobs now.
Combined job scheduled marking and external ID tracking.
Added external ID support to jobs (useful for auto-ID queues).
Added job executor check before sync.
Fixed wrong SQL query during signal event processing.
Moved creation of jobs into the job executor.
Improved scheduling and removal of jobs / subscriptions.
Added experimental support for timer duration events.
Completed jobs are now removed from the DB. Added some more async tests.
Added test for async-before message start event.
Adjusted to removal of deferred commands from the engine.
Removed direct push of signal commands to the engine.
Added async continuation to events and refactored start process command.
Added async capabilities to gateways and remaining activities.
Generalized async execution of commands into AsyncCommandHandler.
Simplified implementation of management service methods added.
Extracted job scheduler component from the job executor.
Introduced ManagementService.
Added additional constraints to JobQuery.
Added "async-after" and test case.
Raised process dependency version and added TODO for "async-after".
Added an implementation of "async-before" handling an a test case.
Added missing move of execution into async after start node.
Extracted paran name constants and added doc comments.
Added "async-after" handler.
Refactores "async-continuation" into "async-before".
Fixed missing identifier quoutes in job SQL.

Started implmenting an executor for background jobs (async, timers,
etc.)
Bumped min version of process dependency.
Adjusted engine to better sync and mostly serializable commands.
Removed unused variables.
BUGFIX: Fixed wrong var name in deployment name query constraint.
Fixed wrong case of UUID class in import statements.
Bumped min Monolog version to 1.3
Improved testing.
Loading all dependencies from source now.

Attempting to test without code coverage due to PHPUnit token stream
crashing when finally token is found.
Switched to PHPUnit ~4.4 and adjusted composer options.
Switched to update as means of dependency installation.
Testing against lowest dependency versions as well now.
Added alias dev-master to 0.1.x-dev and version constraints.
Prepared for release of version 0.1.0
Using DB UUID transformer in all queries.
BPMN engine now uses DB schema object prefix "bpmn_"
Creating ZIP archive using ZipArchive instead of PharData now.
User tasks can now be used without process instances.
Added more control over debug messages and changed zip-archive test.
Making use of new migration helper method from DB test trait now.

MySQL platform now properly escaped :kk param and uses TRUNCATE instead
of DELETE.
Adjusted business process test case to new DB test trait.
Dumped deprecated DB schema files and UUID param encoder.

Switched to using KoolKode DB migrations instead of DDL files for schema
creation.
Switched to PDO DB connection in test case.
Switched to DB ConnectionManager.
Bugfix in task query.
Attempting simplification of travis ci envs in test config.
Added accessors to DeployedResource.
Integrated changed API of XML document builder.
Removed legacy LOB stream usage.
Improved DateTime handling.
Removed obsolete events.
Added missing accessor for deployment ID in ProcessDefinition.
Added execution interceptors to the process engine.
Improved usage of events in the process engine.
Renamed BusinessProcessDefinition to ProcessDefinition.
Integrated ProcessModel changes from koolkode/process.
Added a way to deploy directories to the engine.
Checking file exists and readable when deploying archive.
Suppressing error when closing ZIP archive.
Skip directories during deployment.
Added deployment of ZIP archives to the engine.
Added deployment ID to process definition object.
Fixed missing link from process definition to deployment.
Added a way to aquire deployed resources from a deployment.
Fixed typo in JSON-serialization.
Added JSON-serialization to deployments.

Added deployments to the BPMN engine, they are packages of processes and
resources.
Added filter by exact priority value(s) to task query.
Added ability to filter query by user task creation dates.
Added priorities and due dates to user tasks.
Added query filter by assignee and added index in DB schema.
Unified and extended task query.
Unified and extended process definition query.
Extended message correlation.
Introduced abstract query base class and unified predicate generation.
Added ability to query for multiple process instances / executions.
Added a way to query for multiple executions by ID in one query.
Added check for existence whenever grabbing execution from engine.
Switched to autoload-dev.
Added debug info.
Fixed typo in execution JSON-serialization.
Added a method to start a process instance using a process definition.
Added a way to query for process definition id.
Changed name of deploy date in JSON-serialization.
Added JSON-serialization to entities returned by queries.
Adjusted dependency versions.
Added a way to inspect execution variables using the runtime service.

Added a fallback method that allows for equal / not equal to comparison
of var values longer then 250 characters.
Added special handling of boolean variables and lowercase strings.

Fixed bug in variable storage and added variable query conditions to
execution query.

Removed partial index from Sqlite DDL, apparently not supported by
version bundled with HHVM.
Switched to execution variable storage in a dedicated table.

Removed DB specific connection settings from test case as they are
handled by KoolKode Database.
Integrated with schema object prefix decoration.
Fixed errors and made improvements related to DB API usage.
Adapted to changes in database API.
Changed Sqlite data types to be a little more generic.

Ensuring PostgreSQL is using UTF8 encoded text columns during travis
build.

Excluding PostgreSQL tests when running HHVM due to missing driver
support.
Switched PostgreSQL id columns from binary to character(32).
Attempting PDO LOB binding.
Added proper handling of UUID and binary column values using encoders.
Using "psql" instead of "pgsql" in travis.yml
Attempting PostgreSQL testing for the first time...
Improved code coverage in tests.
Properly(?!) quoting exported travis env variables now.
Using env variables instead of multiple phpunit.xml files.
Improved DB env config and added nested transaction support to engine.
Moved SQL files to engine namespace.
Added DROP TABLE statements in database setup scripts.
Added MySQL to the test system.
Fixed alias name when selecting process event subscriptions.

Fixed missing constraint when a query should return only process
instances.

Improved usage of KoolKode database features (table prefixes /
identifier quoting).
Replaced temporary PDO wrapper with KoolKode database connection.
Added execution depth to persisted execution table and commands.

Integrated non-interrupting event sub process, still needs some more
work.
Generalized event subscription behavior.

Moved test case to dedicated namespace and added annotation-based
message and service task handlers.
Added test for script task with result variable.
Added manual tasks.
Added checkpoints using intermediate none events.
Re-using same XPath instance in diagram loader.
Cleanup and prepare event sub process test diagram.
Refactored process diagram loader to make use of multiple parse methods.
Added terminate end event.
Cleanup and added some more doc comments.
Added deferred node execution to start process instance command.

Added non-interrupting boundary event and related assertions to sub
process test.
Adjusted doc comments and usage of constant during variable access.
Added sub process element and adjusted log output.
Added test for signal start and signal / message end events.
Fixed bugs related to signal behavior and subscriptions.
Adjusted code to removal of default callback behavior in process nodes.
Added signal start events and signal / message end events.

Added signal start event subscriptions and fixed removal of
subscriptions during deployment.
Added non-interrupting bounday events.
Fixed documentation in user tasks and added assertions to unit test.
Added documentation loaded from BPMN 2.0 diagrams.

Refactored process building and introduced inherited basic
behavior-related attributes.
Added message boundary event and unit test.
Code cleanup and added some more doc comments.

Added support for boundary events, as of now only signal events are
implemented.
Added dedicated test for event based gateway.
RuntimeService can now set the value of a process variable.
Removed unnedded behavior implementation.

Fixed removal of signal subscriptions and added some assertions to
verify correctness.
Implemented event based gateway and adjusted pizza test acoordingly.
Implemented new nested execution support in call activity.
Adapted to changes related to execution variables.
Added claim / unclaim checks throwing exceptions.
Added ability to claim / unclaim tasks to TaskService.

Added assignee to user task and source expressions to call activity IO
mapping.
Added initial support and a unir test for BPMN call activities.
Added result variable to script tasks.
Removed fallback to service task behavior and added dummy nodes instead.
Added service task handler registration in test case.
Adapted to changes in process component.
Moved script task to delegate namespace and added some comments.
Added result variable support to service task expression.
Integrated additional service task implementations.
Integrated expression support with BPMN element attributes.

issue_comments.body:
Hi Suraj,

the BPMN engine is pretty stable when it comes to very basic process elements (service / user tasks, sequence flows, and gateways). More advanced elements (especially boundary events) are in a highly experimental state and will have to undergo some major refactoring(s) in the future. The basic API of the engine closely follows Activiti (activiti.org) thats why i consider it be somewhat stable.

**I have not been using this engine in a real life project so far and would not consider it to be stable at this point.**

The basics of the engine are provided by "koolkode/process", which is an abstraction of what a process could be. I think that the process package is pretty much stable at this point. I have done quite a bit of testing there. I am running DB test cases of the BPMN engine on Sqlite, MySQL and PostgreSQL that are working out fine.

There are some points that require more work:
- ~~DB migrations (from "koolkode/database") cannot be applied using command prompt or a web API so far, i need to fix this or at least implement a way to dump needed SQL.~~
- User tasks are missing candidate users / groups, delegation, categories and comments.
- There is no access control built into any of the engine services.
- ~~Any kind of timer jobs / async continuations are missing due to limitations of PHP as a language.~~

I do not have enough free time to implement most of these in the near future.
If you really need a full-featured BPMN engine for your project i suggest you try out Activiti or camunda BPMN (http://camunda.com/de/bpm/features/) which is a fork of Activiti.

Best regards
Martin

Hi Jim,

i decided not to implement the form-related features of Activiti because i never used them. Most of the time i needed more control over forms / layouts than auto-generated forms provided. There are no plans to implement such a feature.

I suggest using any kind of web framework (Symfony, Laravel, etc...) to handle the user interaction and forms. Use the TaskService to complete / claim tasks and pass (validated) form data to the complete() method to make it available as process variables.
